Message:
At that moment,
I heard someone shout.

I raised my head to see
a young man with a staff
standing before me...

And as I sat there dumbfounded,
he held his hand out to me.

You need my power?
To protect the future?

I couldn’t even set one
thing right in this town.
How could I even...?

In that instant,
I suddenly felt warm
gazes beaming at me.

They were looking at me—
their eyes trembling
with feelings of guilt...

My lessons are safe
and sound inside of them.

Yes... What’s important
is the love we have
for each other.

I briefly gazed
back at my students,

The only way to break
the chains of madness
afflicting this town
is to set it right from
the ground up.

Who are the attackers,
and who are the attacked...?
I’ll unravel the answer
to that question.

Then one day,
I need to teach them.

Teach them about
the great hero who saved the world.
